title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: This Giant Subterranean Neutrino Detector Is Taking On the Mysteries of Physics
items.description: Located in China, Juno is a 17-country collaboration that will try to detect neutrinos and antineutrinos to learn more about their mass.

items.title: Mushroom Supplements Are the Biohackers’ Latest Fix (2025)
items.description: Curious about mushroom supplements? Here’s what they do, what the science says, and how to know if they’re right for you—according to the experts.

items.title: Groww, backed by Satya Nadella, set to become first Indian startup to go public after U.S.-to-India move
items.description: Groww's listing — expected later this year — is set to double as a major cash-out moment for global venture funds.

items.title: WIRED’s Best E-Readers, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Kindle, Kobo, Boox
items.description: These WIRED-tested ebook readers let you take your library anywhere.

items.title: Canon Promo Codes: 10% Off | September 2025
items.description: Save 10%, plus over $900 on cameras, lenses, and more with today’s Canon coupons for new and refurbished tech.

items.title: India’s Urban Company soars 58% above IPO price in year’s most subscribed offering
items.description: Urban Company’s IPO, which opened last week, was oversubscribed more than 100 times, reflecting strong investor demand.

items.title: Meta Connect 2025: What to expect and how to watch
items.description: Meta is expected to unveil new versions of its AI-powered smart glasses, as well as a gesture-indicating wristband.

items.title: Same-day delivery comes to space, as Impulse promises satellite transport in hours, not months
